items.sentence: I know Tom isn\'t planning to go to Boston with you.
Can you tell us what happened at school last Monday?
The bus driver was the only one who wasn\'t injured.
Tom wasn\'t with us the last time we came to Boston.
We\'d like to spend about three months in Australia.
Right now, all I want to do is get something to eat.
Tom knew Mary was going to be in the office all day.
I still think that it\'s unlikely that Tom will win.
I forgot to tell Tom I wasn\'t planning to be there.
Maybe I shouldn\'t have gone there so late at night.
